entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Whitecourt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -6.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:29 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
